name: polychat
description: PolyChat - Multi-service application with web frontend and realtime server

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=web & npm run dev --workspace=realtime-server
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=web && npm run build --workspace=realtime-server
scripts.deploy:web: cd web && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:server: cd realtime-server && npm run build && npm start
